entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
